title: Centers for Complementary Medicine
cleaned_text: Centers for Complementary Medicine Live Well. Naturally. Centers for Complementary Medicine Live Well. Naturally. Centers for Complementary Medicine PLEASE NOTE: We will not be able see you for an acupuncture or chiropractic appointment if you have cold or flu symptoms (cough, fever, shortness of breath) on the day of your appointment. Currently, we are limited to scheduling 3 appointments per modality at one time to ensure optimal scheduling availability for all. Please call us directly at 844-800-0788 to schedule your appointment. At the Kaiser Permanente Center for Complementary Medicine (CCM), our mission is to make lives better by restoring mind and body health. Our vision is to integrate complementary medicine into the health care system to improve clinical outcomes.
